column5: This room is a luxurious and tranquil space that is both comfortable and functional. It includes a newly remodeled private bathroom and cozy sleeper sofa. This space is great for layovers, students, or everyday travelers. Perfect location for US MLES students. Quick access to I-45, Hardy Toll Road and The Woodlands. 10 minutes to Bush IAH. We can't wait to meet you!
column8: Luxurious Room with Private Bath Near IAH
